short_summary: Enhancements to the National Learning Annex (NLA) in the northern region of Quebec
description: Tenders are invited for the federal construction, located in Ste. Anne-des-Lacs, Quebec. However, that is not what this contract is about. The tender supersedes a previous publication that was in French only.
duration_in_months: Oh yes you did, you did in fact hear that right, So, the Acme corporation, the Acme digitization program ITSO-related services, that is! duration of the project is 36 months
